decision_conditions: The proposed rear roof extension by reason of its siting, scale, bulk and design constitutes an incongruous and obtrusive form of development which would detract from the character and appearance of the host dwellinghouse and the conservation area. As such the proposed development would be contrary to Policy D3 and D4 of the London Plan (2021), Policies D3 and D7 of the OPDC (2022), Policy 7.4 of the Ealing Development Management DPD (2013), National Planning Policy Framework 2021 - Section 12 - Achieving well-designed places, Supplementary Planning Document 4 - Residential Extensions and the Old Oak Lane Conservation Area Management Plan (2007).
description: Single storey rear extension (following the demolition of existing extension); Rear roof extension; Installation of two roof lights to front roof slope
